  • Constructor Details

    • GamePane

      public GamePane(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Scene scene, StartScreen home, GameScreen gameScreen)
      Constructor for the start of a new game. Sets up references to the stage and scene, as well as starting from level 0. Runs the game.
      Parameters:
      stage - The stage of the window
      scene - The current scene the pane exist on
      home - The home screen pane object
      gameScreen - The game screen pane object

    • GamePane

      public GamePane()
      Constructor for a new level in the game. One is added to the level and the game restarts.

  • Method Details

    • gameLoop

      public void gameLoop()
      The main loop of the game. Handles moving bullets, detecting collisions, drawing the frame, and changing the level when necessary.

    • orderSprites

      public static Sprite[] orderSprites(Sprite object1, Sprite object2)
      Orders the two sprites in alphabetical order so that they are in a known order for detectAndHandleCollisions.
      Parameters:
      object1 - The first sprite to be ordered
      object2 - The second sprite to be ordered
      Returns:
      Array of the two aliens in alphabetical order

    • shoot

      public void shoot()
      Lets the player shoot bullets. Checks that enough time has passed and shoots if it has.

    • alienShoot

      public void alienShoot(Sprite object)
      Lets the aliens shoot bullets. Spawns a bullet at the alien's location.
      Parameters:
      object - The alien that is shooting

    • bossShoot

      public void bossShoot(Sprite object)
      Lets the boss shoot bullets. Spawns a bullet at the boss's location.
      Parameters:
      object - The boss object that is shooting

    • startBossBattle

      public void startBossBattle()
      Starts the boss battle.

    • drawFrame

      public void drawFrame()
      Draws a frame of the game

    • getCanvas

      public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas getCanvas()

    • getTimers

      public ArrayList<Timer> getTimers()

    • getPlayer

      public static Player getPlayer()

    • getLevelNum

      public static int getLevelNum()
